metadata.inclusion: To include the device start the inclusion on your controller and then hit the little button on the wireless module for 1 second
metadata.exclusion: To exclude the device start the inclusion on your controller and then hit the little button on the wireless module for 1 second
metadata.reset:
To reset the device keep the button pushed for 10 seconds. After 5 seconds the led starts flashing and after another 5
seconds there is a short beep signaling the successful reset back to factory defaults. Use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
